Tucson did not like having to resort to what he was doing but he knew that =
in times such as these, everyone would have to do something they did not li=
ke to do.  It was a part of building integrity and wisdom, which Tucson bel=
ieved in most of all.  Without wisdom, how could one evolve into a respecte=
d individual?  A look of shock and sheer annoyance floods his face.  Yet be=
fore anything else he looks to Cyclonus and the others before addressing Ro=
dimus.

" Excuse us for a moment.  Wait here, we'll be right back."

With t=
hat he sharply turns to land quickly on the ground and does so on all fours=
 with a solid thud.  Ground debris dances beneath him due to the impact as =
he swiftly gets into robot mode , not waiting for Rodimus to dismount.  Nor=
mally he would not have done so but it was clear he was less than impressed=
 with his comment.  He stands firmly with an angry expression on his facepl=
ate.

" I am not thrilled to be doing this myself but there are times when =
we ALL must do things we dislike doing.  I thought you might have enough in=
tegrity to understand our situation.  Apparently I was wrong.  After everyt=
hing I went through to bring you back safely, and THAT IS HOW YOU RETURN TH=
E FAVOR!?   BY DIRESPECTING CYCLONUS YOU DISRESPECT ME! "

He takes a momen=
t to cool off his overheated temper. He replies to Wing Caliber in the mean=
 time.

" Of course, please retain a defense force at the Ark by all means.=
 "

He turns back to Rodimus.

" I'll leave it up to you to decide what you=
 want to do."

His expression remains curt while with Rodimus.  

Meanwhile=
, Straight Shot's beacon begins to flash a little bit faster as Waspinator =
continues his course.  

" That's it Waspinator!  You're on target!  Keep o=
n a northward track, my signal is getting really strong now.  Scourge, be r=
eady with the sweeps!  It's only a matter of time before we reach our targe=
t!"

Below everyone, Night Shift now makes it into the forest and spots Was=
pinator with Straight Shot in tow.  Having got the memo, he follows them fr=
om below.

" Hey, thought ya might need backup! " 

Straight Shot picks up =
on Night Shift but also Elita.  

" WHAT THE PIT ARE YA DOING BRINGING ELIT=
A INTO THIS!?  ARE YOU OUT OF YOUR PROCESSOR?!" 

Night Shift replies sheep=
ishly.

"I know, I'm in trouble.  But I couldn't leave her alone without pr=
otection. Besides, she has ta learn how ta take on a challenge at some poin=
t, and now is a good a time as any ta start teaching her."

Straight Shot s=
ighs and shrugs it off.  

" Okay if you say so.  Just don't let Rodimus fi=
nd out."

She turns to Waspinator.

" Sorry about that, I had to reply to N=
ightshift."

With plans moving forward, everyone puts their minds on what n=
eeds to be done.

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.
